mapper.select:
select tt.id,tt.name,tt.simplename,tt.shopid,u.name operator,tt.opttime ,tt.access_token,tt.api,tt.uploadpath from t_erp_ship_transcompany tt left join t_userinfo u on u.id=tt.operator where tt.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and tt.isdelete=#{isdelete,jdbcType=CHAR}
and (tt.name like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR} or tt.simplename like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR})

select tt.id,tt.name,tt.simplename,tt.shopid,u.name operator,td.opttime, td.channame,td.pretime,td.price,m.`name` marketname,td.subarea, td.priceunits,td.drate,td.cbmrate,tp.name transtype,td.remark,c.name channeltype from
t_erp_ship_transdetail td
(select h.* from t_erp_ship_transdetail_his h inner join (select id,max(opttime) opttime from t_erp_ship_transdetail_his where opttime<#{mydate,jdbcType=CHAR} group by id ) v on v.opttime=h.opttime and v.id=h.id ) td
left join t_erp_ship_transcompany tt on tt.id=td.company left join t_userinfo u on u.id=td.operator left join t_marketplace m on td.marketplaceid=m.marketplaceId left join t_erp_transtype tp on tp.id=td.transtype left join t_erp_ship_transchannel c on c.id=td.channel where tt.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR}
and td.disabled=0
and (tt.name like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR} or tt.simplename like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR})
select tt.id,tt.name,tt.simplename,tt.shopid,u.name operator,tt.opttime from t_erp_ship_transcompany tt left join t_userinfo u on u.id=tt.operator where tt.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} limit 4

select s.*,m.name mname,c.name cname,ty.name tname, case when s.priceunits='volume' then '体积(m3)' else '重量(kg)' end priceu,c.name channeltype from t_erp_ship_transcompany t left join t_erp_ship_transdetail s on s.company=t.id left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceId=s.marketplaceid left join t_erp_ship_transchannel c on c.id=s.channel left join t_erp_transtype ty on ty.id=s.transtype where t.id=#{comid,jdbcType=CHAR} and s.disabled=0 order by m.findex

select s.*,m.name mname,c.name cname,ty.name tname, case when s.priceunits='volume' then '体积(m3)' else '重量(kg)' end priceu,c.name channeltype from t_erp_ship_transcompany t left join t_erp_ship_transdetail s on s.company=t.id left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceId=s.marketplaceid left join t_erp_ship_transchannel c on c.id=s.channel left join t_erp_transtype ty on ty.id=s.transtype where t.id=#{comid,jdbcType=CHAR} and s.disabled=1 order by m.findex
